messages.message:
Dale, can you introduce me to Scott? 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/scottholden

I can provide examples for most of those. Misting and temperature and humidity control over IoT. Finger tracked touch surface using OpenCV, rebuilt entire radio station from ground up for A/V, wrote iOS app and back end content management system for 
studysauce.com
 (2500+ users).

Can you arrange all of the things under IOT? That may get you an interview. Shot gun approach might be interpreted as lack of focus on career objectives. How about a reference saying IOT and its applications (to mobile, web, interfaces and notifications)?  Once you get to talk they can match you to their internal needs....
Yeah IoT would be accurate, I should rearrange my profile on LinkedIn?
Would Scott Holden be interested in walking me through some things?  I thought my resume looked kind of nice.

I am uncertain how much a recruiter gets involved in doing that.They generally are looking to build a list for their customers, HR departments.
I will try an IOT angle on an introduction. Good luck
Hi Brian.  Here is an introduction to Scott Holden. Scott-Brian is interested in opportunities involving IOT and web applications -- I am hoping you can help him out!
Gail referred me to Scott too.  What a brilliant impression he's made!
